title: Will League ever be on chromebooks?
body: I own a chromebook and I use that primarily. Is  there ever gonna be a chromebook version of league cuz that would be extremely convenient.

replies.body:
I can't give you a 100% answer, but the 99% answer is most likely not.  League would need to be optimized to run on a completely different and new OS, which is a hefty undertaking.  Additionally, most chromebooks do not have the sheer power necessary to run League of Legends at 60 FPS.

I wish I had better news!  :(
